snippet.title: Mario Party Challenge World Prototype @ IAAPA2017 (Raw Thrills/Capcom/Nintendo)
snippet.description: http://arcadeheroes.com - Licensed by Nintendo, developed by Capcom and adapted for Western use by Raw Thrills, IAAPA 2017 saw the introduction of Mario Party Challenge World. As the video points out this is very much a WIP, with the game supposed to change to a more "simplified" format while also introducing more skill. As it is, this is more of a hardware tech demo than a game. Slated for launch in Spring 2018.
